snippet: The San Jose Sharks’ bearded defenseman has played a big role in putting the team close to its first appearance in the Stanley Cup finals.
lead_paragraph: The San Jose Sharks’ bearded defenseman has played a big role in putting the team close to its first appearance in the Stanley Cup finals.

headline.main: Brent Burns, a Quirky San Jose Shark, Proves His Worth in the Playoffs
headline.print_headline: A Quirky Shark Rises in the Playoffs
